reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and challenging assignments. Dr. Hartwell really knows her stuff!

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Absolutely brilliant! Prof. Chang's passion for literature is contagious.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Decent instructor, but the course material could be more organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Fascinating insights into historical events. Prof. Garcia makes history come alive.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult to follow lectures. More office hours would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Prof. Wilson breaks down complex concepts with ease.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions and interesting research projects.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes rushes through important topics.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Inspiring lecturer with a genuine passion for environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dry lectures and unclear expectations for assignments.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging discussions on contemporary social issues. Very approachable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-expanding lectures. Prof. Wilson challenges students to think critically.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter, but lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and brings artworks to life with his descriptions.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex political theories and current events.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Seems disorganized and often unprepared for class.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content and engaging field trip opportunities.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Solid fundamentals, but could use more real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and educator. Makes complex concepts accessible.

reviews.subject: Film Studies
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of films and engaging class discussions.
